content:
Diagnosis:
Prostate adenocarcinoma with vacuolated cell features
T2b N0 M0, diagnosed January 2024
Initial PSA 8.9, PTEN monoallelic loss on genomic testing

Previous medical history:
Hypertension
Type 2 diabetes

Current medications:
Bicalutamide 150mg daily
Leuprorelin 3-monthly depot
Metformin
Ramipril

Current situation:
PSA trend:
8.9 (Jan 2024)
0.8 (Mar 2024)
0.4 (today)

Seen for review following 3 months of hormone therapy. Tolerating treatment well with only grade 1 hot flushes. Performance status remains 0. No urinary symptoms. Digital rectal examination shows reduction in size of right-sided nodule. Latest testosterone confirms castrate level at 0.4nmol/L. Plan to continue current hormone therapy with PSA check and review in 3 months.
